text: Yadi eti hato asu labhera byapara o halka saphara tabe tara niscaya'i tomake anusarana karato, kintu durgama-patha tadera kache sudirgha mane halo. Ara tara allah‌ra name halapha kare balale -- ''amara yadi paratama tabe niscaya'i tomadera sange amara'o bera hatama.’’ Tara tadera nijedera'i dhbansa sadhana karache, ara allah janena ye tara alabat d'aha mithyabadi.
